author: Ian Sandwell
title: Watch Keith Lemon star in Back to the Future tribute titles - TV
text: function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4552834481001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14552834481001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4552834481001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4552834481001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14552834481001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4552834481001.init(); ai_type="video"; } You can see Keith Lemon go back in time in a new clip exclusive to Digital Spy.Hit play above to watch the title sequence for Keith Lemon's Back t'Future Tribute, airing on ITV2 at 9pm on October 21.The 90-minute special will see Lemon reenact some of his favourite Back to the Future scenes with the help of his celebrity friends.Paddy McGuinness will take on the role of Biff, Gino D'Acampo will play Doc and McBusted will perform 'Johnny B Goode'.Lemon will also visit iconic locations from the film and meet some of the cast members and crew, such as co-creator Bob Gale. Â© ITV The comedian admits he was starstruck filming the special, meeting the likes of Claudia Wells (Jennifer Parker, Marty McFly's girlfriend) and Gale."I meet a lot of people doing what I do but this was different. This was like meeting people I've loved since me childhood."Lemon joked that "it's a very self-indulgent show" but one that was a dream for him."The highlights were meeting Bob and the cast and recretaing all t' classic scenes. I was like a little boy in a toy shop."I can still remember the smell of popcorn and the pissy floor of the cinema I first saw it in. I've been a fan ever since. All the clobber I wear in t' show is actually mine!"Keith Lemon's Back t'Future Tribute airs on ITV2 at 9pm on October 21.
